invention-title: Host-guest Zn-MOF material with wavy structure, preparation method thereof and application of host-guest Zn-MOF material in preparation of adjustable cyan light-emitting diode (LED)
波浪状结构的主客体Zn-MOF材料及其制法与在制备可调青光LED中的应用

abstract.p: The invention provides a wavy host-guest Zn-MOF material, the chemical general formula of the wavy host-guest Zn-MOF material is {[Zn (H2odpa) (pyan)] (pyan)} n, the wavy host-guest Zn-MOF material belongs to a monoclinic system, the space group of the wavy host-guest Zn-MOF material is P2/c, the cell parameter of the wavy host-guest Zn-MOF material is # imgabs0 # # imgabs1 #, in the chemical general formula, the component H2odpa 2-is obtained by removing two protons from semi-rigid aromatic tetracarboxylic acid H4odpa, the structure of the H4odpa is shown as a formula I, the structure of the component pyan is shown as a formula II, and the structural formula of the component pyan is shown as a formula III. The host-guest Zn-MOF material with the wavy structure prepared by the invention is a host-guest body type {[Zn (H2odpa) (pyan)] (pyan)} n crystalline material constructed through rich O-H... N hydrogen bonds based on a two-dimensional metal-organic coordination polymerization layer, the yield can reach 80%, and the thermal stability is relatively high. When used as a single-component non-rare-earth light conversion material for manufacturing an LED device, the rare-earth light conversion material can emit high-brightness and adjustable composite cyan light during working, and is an energy-saving and environment-friendly special light-emitting component which has application prospects, is multipurpose and can be driven at low power.

本发明提供了一种波浪状结构的主客体Zn‑MOF材料，其化学通式为{[Zn(H2odpa)(pyan)](pyan)}n，属于单斜晶系，空间群为P2/c，晶胞参数#imgabs0##imgabs1#所述化学通式中，组分H2odpa2‑是半刚性的芳香四元羧酸H4odpa脱去2个质子所得，所述H4odpa结构如式Ⅰ所示，组分pyan结构如式II所示，#imgabs2#本发明制备的波浪状结构的主客体Zn‑MOF材料是基于二维金属‑有机配位聚合层，通过丰富的O‑H···N氢键构筑的主客体型{[Zn(H2odpa)(pyan)](pyan)}n晶态材料，产率可达80％，具有较高的热稳定性。作为单成分非稀土转光材料制作LED器件，工作时能发出高亮度、可调的复合型青光，是一种有应用前景的多用途、可低功率驱动的节能环保型特色发光元器件。
